mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Price, Chandler, 1765 or 6-1827
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Believes people associated with Burr plan to meet at New Orleans; his ship, Orleans under Captian Toby about to sail for New Orleans; Doctor Bollman and two others plotting against country asked for passage on ship; feels duty to report the circumstance.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Burr, Aaron, 1756-1836
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1807 November 20, Philad[elphia, Pennsylvania] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
